egress.description: All egress (consider restricting / adding VPC endpoints)
All egress (consider restricting / adding VPC endpoints)

constant_value.description: All egress (consider restricting / adding VPC endpoints)

acm_certificate_arn.description: ACM certificate ARN for ALB HTTPS listener. If empty, an HTTP listener on :80 will be created instead.

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended)

container_port.description: Container port exposed by the application

enable_http_to_https_redirect.description: If true and acm_certificate_arn is set, create an HTTP :80 listener that redirects to HTTPS :443

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path

log_group_name.description: CloudWatch log group name for ECS
